snippet: Julián Leyzaola Pérez gained attention and stirred controversy for aggressive law enforcement in the border cities of Tijuana and Ciudad Juárez.
abstract: Mexican authorities say Julian Leyzaola Perez, former police chief in Tijuana and Ciudad Juarez, was seriously wounded in shooting apparently carried out by hit men.
lead_paragraph: Julián Leyzaola Pérez gained attention and stirred controversy for aggressive law enforcement in the border cities of Tijuana and Ciudad Juárez.

headline.main: Ex-Police Chief in Mexico Known for Crackdowns Is Shot
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | The Americas; Mexico: A Former Police Chief Is Shot
